about.title: About me
about.desc1: I completed the Geeks courses on Frontend development which lasted 5 months. Then I interned in the 8th stream of Geeks Pro. Now I'm interning in the 9th stream.
about.desc2: My passion for frontend development is not only reflected in my experience but also in the enthusiasm and dedication I bring to each project.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.leftDesc: I'm currently available to take on new projects, so feel free to send me a message. You can contact me anytime.
contact.name: Your Name

list.s_desc: I create modern and adaptive websites that display perfectly on all devices - from smartphones to desktops.
I work with REST API and make websites not only beautiful, but also functional - with dynamic data, interactive elements and animation.
I create fast, scalable, and component-based user interfaces with React.js. I apply best practices and make the code clean, maintainable, and scalable.
I use Redux Toolkit for convenient and efficient application state management. I simplify work with asynchronous requests and storage structure, which is especially important for large projects.
I integrate React Query for convenient work with server data: caching, repeated requests, automatic data updates and excellent work with asynchrony without unnecessary code.
I use Zustand as a lightweight alternative to Redux ‚Äî for local or global state without unnecessary complexity. Great for projects where performance and simplicity are important.
